cause.description:
These are some facts you might want to know......
INDIA
35 million orphans 9% of all children are orphans 5,000 orphans affected by the tsunami in just one small area where VisionTrust is working 9% (2.2 million) die before age 5 every year of preventable causes 6.5% of all children will die before age one
CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC
290,000 orphans 16% of all children are orphans 100 new orphans every day At best, orphans eat only once per day Ranks #18 in the world for infant mortality 18% will die before age five (rate is among the world's highest) 12% will die before age one 79% sleep without malaria-carrying mosquito protection 21% are dying with AIDS/HIV 110,000 children are orphans due to AIDS/HIV Life expectancy is only to age 40 56% of all children are forced into child labor 9% of all children suffer from moderate to severe starvation
WORLD
150 million orphans 8% of all children are orphans 42,200 children are orphaned every day 10.6 million (8%) of all children will die of preventable causes before age five 5.4% of all children will die before age one
Help Us Please!!!!!
1. Help build shelter
2. Get them food/water
3. Give them a an opportunity at dreams
cause.mission: Help children who are less fortunate than us.
cause.name: Save Orphans All Over The World
